column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: hazard event. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```ttl@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix he: <http://www.example.com/HazardEvent#> .he:HazardEvent rdf:type rdfs:Class ;               rdfs:label "Hazard Event" ;               rdfs:comment "Represent events that are potentially hazardous or harmful" .he:hasSeverity rdf:type rdf:Property ;               rdfs:label "has severity" ;               rdfs:domain he:HazardEvent ;               rdfs:range xsd:string ;               rdfs:comment "The severity level of the hazard event, often represented as low, medium, high, etc." .he:hasLocation rdf:type rdf:Property ;               rdfs:label "has location" ;               rdfs:domain he:HazardEvent ;               rdfs:range xsd:string ;               rdfs:comment "The geographical location where the hazard event occurs." .he:hasEventType rdf:type rdf:Property ;                rdfs:label "has event type" ;                rdfs:domain he:HazardEvent ;                rdfs:range xsd:string ;                rdfs:comment "The type or category of the hazard event, such as earthquake, flood, hurricane, etc." .he:hasStartTime rdf:type rdf:Property ;                rdfs:label "has start time" ;                rdfs:domain he:HazardEvent ;                rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;                rdfs:comment "The starting time of the hazard event." .he:hasEndTime rdf:type rdf:Property ;              rdfs:label "has end time" ;              rdfs:domain he:HazardEvent ;              rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;              rdfs:comment "The ending time of the hazard event." .```
